main.title: Around the world on foot
main.phrase1: You only live once. But if you do it right, once is enough
main.description:
I am now embarking on a journey that will take between 10 and 15 years to walk around the world. This journey will begin in Bogota, Colombia. From there, I will head north, passing through Central America and across the United States and Canada, until I reach Alaska. From Alaska, I will take a boat or plane to the east coast of Asia.

I will continue across the Himalayas, into Europe, and then down through Africa to South Africa. From there, I will cross by boat or plane to Argentina. Finally, from Argentina I will walk north through South America until I return to Bogota. Welcome to this great adventure.
main.phrase2: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a simple step
